com.prodp.apsim
Class APProcessHandler

java.lang.Object
  com.prodp.apsim.APObject
      com.prodp.apsim.APProcessHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener
public class APProcessHandler
extends APObject
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener

Main controller for all APSim processes. Handles APProcesses and switches between them. All necessary functions are called from here, or are declared here.

incBrushSize

public static void incBrushSize()
Increments the brush size by one. It detaches the interchangable BranchGroup from its parent and attaches the bigger brush BranchGroup to the visible parent BranchGroup.

decBrushSize

public static void decBrushSize()
Decrements the brush size by one. It detaches the interchangable BranchGroup from its parent and attaches the smaller brush BranchGroup to the visible parent BranchGroup.

toggleFrozen

public static void toggleFrozen()
Toggles if the scene is frozen.

setBrushSize

public static void setBrushSize(int s)
Sets the brush size to a new brush size. If the new brush size is greater than the current brush size it increases the brush size until it is equal. If the new brush size is less than the current brush size it decreases the brush size until it is equal. Otherwise nothing happens.

Parameters:
s - the new brush size.

getBrushSize

public static int getBrushSize()
Gets the current brush size.

Returns:
the brush size

public void init()
          throws java.awt.AWTException,
                 java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                 java.lang.InstantiationException,
                 java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                 javax.swing.UnsupportedLookAndFeelException,

                         throws java.io.IOException
Update the server processes.

Parameters:
srv - the server thread
Throws:
java.io.IOException

performEnvironmentFunctions

public static void performEnvironmentFunctions()
Performs all functions to update the blocks through moving them around or causing reactions. It takes into account the blocks' attributes, defined in APMaterial.

renewBrushLocs

public static void renewBrushLocs(APProcess process,
                                  javax.vecmath.Vector3d SR_VECTOR)
Renews the brush box locations. It takes the original brush location and appends it to the player position.

Parameters:
process - the current process
SR_VECTOR - the original brush location

updatePosition

public static void updatePosition()
Updates the player position and the sky position.

destroy

public static void destroy()
Kills the task and ends the game.

countUp

public static void countUp()
Adds a block to the scene. Calculates the positions added via brush box locations, then loops through them, adding them one by one to the scene. It does not add blocks if there is a block already there. If the limit is reached it stops. Adding new blocks requires updating coordinates, integral coordinates, and colors.

processMouseMovement

public void processMouseMovement(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
Updates the player viewpoint based on the mouse position. Sensitivity also affects mouse movement. The unit is in pi; Eulerian rotation is used.

Parameters:
e -

startRecording

public static void startRecording()
Records a series of 3D models; these can be rendered as a sequence when converted to renderable format. It uses a timer to take a snapshot of the scene every while.

stopRecording

public static void stopRecording()
Stops recording the scene.

See Also:
startRecording()
